description:
http://anidb.net/ch39363 [Hajime]`s homeroom teacher. He has a very mellow personality and at first glance, he seems like an average, ordinary man. But Mr. Yamamoto has an important role in policing the area and he can pull off some surprising fighting techniques! Mr. Yamamoto is an easy-going, approachable guy, and he`s very popular amongst his students.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Yamamoto Tadakazu
